page.title: 18Ryhope Shopping Centre
page.content: { Ryhope}has a fairly big and modern {shopping centre.}We think it caters very well for people. We surveyed what people thought about the shopping centre in{Ryhope. The majority of people are satisfied with the shops because they cater for their needs, except when people need clothes they have to go elsewhere. Those who did not use the shopping{centre}decided not to, either because of the variety of shops the town centre offered, or they did not live in Ryhope. When we asked people how they thought the{shopping centre}in{Ryhope could be improved some people wanted somewhere for their children to play while they were in the shops, while other people thought it should be cleaner.
